subject: URGENT: Q4 Budget Review Required by Tomorrow
body:
Hi,

I need you to review the Q4 budget proposal ASAP. The board meeting is tomorrow at 10 AM and we need your sign-off before then.

Please review the attached document and send me your feedback by end of day today.

This is critical for our quarterly planning.

Thanks,
John Smith
CEO, Company Inc.

subject: Project Milestone - Need Update
body:
Hello,

Could you please send me an update on the project status? We have a stakeholder meeting next week and I'd like to present the current progress.

Also, can you schedule a call for Thursday to discuss the next phase?

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson
Project Manager, BigCorp

subject: This Week's Top Marketing Tips
body:
Hi there!

Here are this week's top marketing tips:

1. Optimize your email subject lines
2. Use A/B testing for campaigns
3. Focus on customer retention

Click here to read more!

Unsubscribe | Privacy Policy

subject: 1:1 Meeting Tomorrow - Please Prepare
body:
Hi,

Just a reminder about our 1:1 meeting tomorrow at 2 PM.

Please prepare:
- Your progress update on the current sprint
- Any blockers you're facing
- Topics you'd like to discuss

Also, please review the team's performance metrics before we meet.

See you tomorrow!
Emily

subject: Exciting Opportunity at Top Tech Company
body:
Hi,

I came across your profile and thought you'd be a great fit for a Senior Engineer position at a leading tech company.

The role offers:
- Competitive salary ($200k+)
- Remote work options
- Great benefits

Would you be interested in a quick call to discuss?

Best,
Mike Brown
Tech Talent Recruiting

subject: COMPLAINT: Unacceptable Service!
body:
I am extremely disappointed with the service I received!

I have been waiting for 3 weeks for a response to my support ticket and NOTHING has been done. This is absolutely unacceptable!

I demand an immediate resolution or I will be forced to escalate this matter further and leave negative reviews everywhere.

This needs to be fixed TODAY!

Very frustrated,
Angry Customer

subject: Quick question about the API
body:
Hey!

Quick question - do you know if the new API endpoint supports pagination?

I'm working on the dashboard feature and wanted to check before implementing.

No rush, just whenever you have a moment.

Thanks!
Alex

subject: Action Required: Complete Benefits Enrollment by Friday
body:
Dear Employee,

This is a reminder that the open enrollment period for benefits ends this Friday, January 19th.

Please complete the following by the deadline:
1. Review your current benefits selections
2. Make any changes in the HR portal
3. Submit your enrollment confirmation

Failure to complete enrollment may result in loss of coverage.

Questions? Contact HR at hr@company.com

Thank you,
HR Department
